title: The Upside of Your Dark Side
description:
The Upside of Your Dark Side: Why Being Your Whole Self Not Just Your "Good" Self Drives Success and Fulfillment MP3 CD Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Audiobook, MP3 Audio, Unabridged
by Todd Kashdan (Author), Robert Biswas-Diener (Author), Jeff Cummings (Reader) 

In The Upside of Your Dark Side, two pioneering researchers in the field of psychology show that while mindfulness, kindness, and positivity can take us far, they cannot take us all the way. Sometimes, they can even hold us back. Emotions like anger, anxiety, or doubt might be uncomfortable, but it turns out that they are also incredibly useful.

For instance:

The key lies in what the authors call Ã¢â‚¬Å“emotional agility,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ the ability to access our full range of emotionsÃ¢â‚¬â€¢not just the Ã¢â‚¬Å“goodÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ onesÃ¢â‚¬â€¢in order to respond most effectively to whatever situation we might encounter. Drawing on years of scientific research and a wide array of real-life examples including sports, the military, parenting, education, romance, business, and more, The Upside of Your Dark Side is a refreshing reality check that shows us how we can truly maximize our potential
